traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: Zephyros has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Fling
entries: Zephyros tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Zephyros's choice and land {@condition prone}, taking {@dice 1d8} bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

actions.name: Wind Aura
entries: A magical aura of wind surrounds Zephyros. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as he maintains {@status concentration} on it (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Zephyros gains a +2 bonus to his AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

actions.name: Staff of the Magi
entries: Melee atk +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d6 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 23 (3d8 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands. This damage is considered magical..

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zephyros's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
